Description.Text: The European-style casino features two-story windows opening to an outdoor terrace offering sweeping views of the lake and surrounding mountains. The resort offers premier championship golf. A fitness center is also available and is fully equipped. State of the art spa facilities are available on-site. There are a variety of supervised daytime and evening camp activities for children ages 3 to 12. There is a shuttle that runs to/from the Strip four times daily. The ride takes approximately 45 minutes. (0606/CH)
The hotel is situated on the shores of Lake Las Vegas, 17 miles (a thirty minute drive) from the famed Las Vegas Strip.

All guest rooms are Mediterranean-themed and have hand-painted armoires and headboards imported from Morocco. Spacious 390-sq.-ft. rooms offering a choice of one king or two double beds, separate work area, wireless Internet access, refrigerator and Portico bath products. Some rooms with Juliet balconies.

This destination resort is designed in the open-air style of the Mediterranean. There are multiple courtyards, a Moroccan-style palace garden, lavish pool decks and an open-air pavilion and lawn area.

A cafe serves breakfast, lunch and dinner in a relaxed setting, both indoors and out. One restaurant overlooks the lake and offers fine dining with an Asian flair. Other eateries include a coffee bar, a bar and grill located poolside, a lobby lounge, and a private dining room. 24 hour room service is also available.
The lobby is medium-sized with windows that accent the Jack Nicklaus-designed golf course and lake. Adjoining to the lobby is the Arabesquere Lounge which has outside access to the spectacular views.
